content.question: The natural rate of unemployment can be defined as the

choices.label: unemployment rate consistent with accelerating inflation
unemployment rate of the least-skilled workers
economy’s long-run equilibrium rate of unemployment
labor force participation rate plus the unemployment rate
labor force participation rate minus the unemployment rate

content.answer: economy’s long-run equilibrium rate of unemployment

unit.text: 2: Economic Indicators and the Business Cycle

skill.text: Skill 1.A: Describe economic concepts, principles, or models.
